summary: Completed comprehensive frontend testing of AMMO landing page redesign with military/tactical design, dark/light mode toggle, and PWA support. All tests passed successfully.
passed_tests: Landing page loads with AMMO branding and tagline
Theme toggle switches between dark and light modes
Theme persists correctly (dark/light class on html element)
Nav Member Portal button visible and clickable
Nav Dealer Portal button visible and clickable
Nav GOV button visible and clickable
Hero Member Access button visible and clickable
Hero Dealer Portal button visible and clickable
Stats section displays all 4 stats (2.4M+ Members, 99.9% Rate, 15K+ Dealers, 24/7 Monitoring)
Features section displays all 6 feature cards (ARI Score, Training Recognition, Tier Benefits, Real-Time Oversight, Instant Verification, Silent Distress)
Tier showcase displays all 3 tiers (Sentinel, Guardian, Elite Custodian)
Tier ARI score ranges visible (0-59, 60-84, 85-100)
Platform Access cards visible (Member, Dealer, Government)
Platform Access cards are clickable (cursor: pointer)
Demo setup button available
Footer with SAFETY-FIRST messaging visible
PWA manifest.json accessible at /manifest.json (HTTP 200)
Service worker sw.js accessible at /sw.js (HTTP 200)
Service worker registration successful (console log confirmed)
Mobile responsiveness - Hero section renders correctly
Mobile responsiveness - Stats display in 2-column grid
Mobile responsiveness - Feature cards stack properly
Mobile responsiveness - All buttons accessible
Light mode - Good text contrast on light background
Dark mode - Professional tactical aesthetic

success_rate.backend: N/A - Backend not tested this iteration

context_for_next_testing_agent: Landing page redesign with military/tactical theme fully tested. Dark/light mode working. PWA manifest and service worker accessible. Mobile responsiveness verified. All navigation buttons, feature cards, tier cards, and access cards working correctly.
